r.d: Provides easy parsing of URLs and their constituent parts.
r.n: - Fixed Bug #11385 $url was defined. - Fixed Doc #11017 Fixed docblock problem (cweiske) - Fixed Bug #11008 (Override object properties in initialize()) - Fixed Bug #6338 Wrong query string handling - Fixed Bug #704 Fixed hardcoded value and use ini_get(arg_separator) - Fixed Bug #1036 Improper default port number detection - Fixed Bug #1447 use $_SERVER instead of HTTP_SERVER_VARS - Fixed Bug #1558 _parseRawQueryString failed if arg_sep.input was more than 1 char. - Fixed Bug #1682 File was in DOC format rather than Unix - Fixed Bug #2334 Sqare brackets in var names were encoded - Fixed Bug #2824 Better error handling support. - Fixed bug #3159 setProtocol was calling getStandardPort incorrectly
